title: Add Pollination fashion bulk creator to Creative
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Haute Couture Hive
gist.blurb: New in the showcase: a bulk fashion creator for the digitally stylish. Because even robots deserve a fresh look for the season.
gist.summary: Added 'Pollination fashion bulk creator' to the Creative apps directory, enabling bulk generation of AI fashion assets.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and launch this tool to generate atelier-ready fashion collections from prompts.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy pixel art tailor shop/atelier. Polly the bee is the designer (wearing a beret), and the Robot is the model trying on new digital clothes.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a fashion design studio. The cute bee mascot wears a tiny beret and adjusts a lime green (#ecf874) scarf on the chunky robot companion. The robot looks delighted. Background has hanging pixel clothes and soft pastel fabrics. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic. Cozy, wholesome vibes.
